FILE: cm732816v11.0.txt
DYAD: S. KOREA - N. VIETNAM
RIVALRY: RIV1332
DISPUTE(S): MID611 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190317
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190317

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID611

TERRMID: MID611 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID611 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID611 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID611 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID611 from Gibler 2018, this is the Vietnam War, an internationalized civil war that has a territorial dispute element between North and South Vietnam. The US, South Korea, Thailand, Cambodia, Philippines, Australia, and New Zealand supported South Vietnam, and USSR and China supported North Vietnam. China's support for North Vietnam pulls them into this MID against South Vietnam. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to a territorial dispute between North and South Vietnam. 

MARITMID: MID611 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID611 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID611 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID611 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID611 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID611 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID611 coded civil war MID because the Vietnam War is an internationalized civil war. Communist rebels were fighting in South Vietnam against that regime, and were supported by China. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to civil war in South Vietnam, within this dyad. 

CIVWARLINK: MID611 1 -- civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID611 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID611 coded civil war link because the Vietnam War is an internationalized civil war partly occurring in North Vietnam, outside this dyad. 

COUPMID: MID611 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID611 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID611 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID611 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
